name: simple-loan-management
description: A simple loan management DApp using Web3.js and Solidity

scripts.start: parcel src/landing.html src/index.html src/borrower.html src/admin.html src/loans.html src/dashboard.html --open
scripts.build: parcel build src/landing.html src/index.html src/borrower.html src/admin.html src/loans.html src/dashboard.html
